## Carry Recipe
- Wrap folded over itself at one end and draped over shoulder with short end underneath, making a loop
- Wrap draped end around for traditional sling pass
- Feed long end through loop and create pouch
- Feed baby into pouch
- Tighten incrementally through loop
- Bunched reinforcing pass over near leg, and under far leg, tuck up into back pass
